name: Redemption: Tyranny of Daetorem
description: A long time ago, humans and monsters lived in unison. However, the ever-growing population of humanity almost led to the extinction of many races. This in turn drove the monsters to start an uprising against the human race. Grab your spear as you take on the role of a guard called Michail.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 32bit Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 350 MB available space
